channel.title: [508] bulby base, magic problem, can cast on players even if not in wild/bh/pvp
channel.description: i can be at ::home and just randomly cast magic on someone, and kill them and get loot. but i only want pvp to work in pvp places? my ::home isnt a pvp area either.
